verses.text: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w standeth|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w mighty|strong="H0410"\w*; he \w judgeth|strong="H8199"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* the \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 82.1 \ft of Asaph: or, for Asaph\f*

How long will ye \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w unjustly|strong="H5766"\w*, and \w accept|strong="H5375"\w* the \w persons|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*? \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Defend|strong="H8199"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* and \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*: do \w justice|strong="H6663"\w* to the \w afflicted|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H7326"\w*.\f + \fr 82.3 \ft Defend: Heb. Judge\f*

\w Deliver|strong="H6403"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*: \w rid|strong="H5337"\w* \add them\add* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

They \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not, neither will they \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*; they \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* on in \w darkness|strong="H2825"\w*: all the \w foundations|strong="H4144"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* are out of \w course|strong="H4131"\w*.\f + \fr 82.5 \ft outâ€¦: Heb. moved\f*
I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Ye \add are\add* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*; and all of you \add are\add* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*.
\w But|strong="H0403"\w* ye shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* like \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, and \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* like \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*.
\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for thou shalt \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
